${modID}:BitingPreview.NAME: Biting
${modID}:BitingPreview.DESCRIPTION: Damage -20%. NL Heal HP equal to cost.

${modID}:DecayingPreview.NAME: Decaying
${modID}:DecayingPreview.DESCRIPTION: Take 2 damage if in your hand at the end of your turn.

${modID}:DisgracefulPreview.NAME: Disgraceful
${modID}:DisgracefulPreview.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Frail if in your hand at the end of your turn.

${modID}:HesitantPreview.NAME: Hesitant
${modID}:HesitantPreview.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Weak if in your hand at the end of your turn.

${modID}:LiquidizingPreview.NAME: Liquidizing
${modID}:LiquidizingPreview.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a random potion if Fatal. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RegretfulPreview.NAME: Regretful
${modID}:RegretfulPreview.DESCRIPTION: Lose HP equal to the number of cards in your hand if in your hand at the end of your turn.

${modID}:UnawakenedPreview.NAME: Unawakened
${modID}:UnawakenedPreview.DESCRIPTION: Becomes Awakened when transformed or removed.

${modID}:Amplify.DESCRIPTION: {@@}This turn, your next !M! {!M!|@=!M! Power cards are|1=Power card is} played twice.
${modID}:Amplify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}This turn, your next !M! {!M!|@=!M! Power cards are|1=Power card is} played twice.

${modID}:BattleHymn.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of each turn, add {!M!|@=!M! *Smites|1=a *Smite} into your hand.
${modID}:BattleHymn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Innate. NL At the start of each turn, add {!M!|@=!M! *Smites|1=a *Smite} into your hand.

${modID}:Buffer.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Prevent the next {!M!|@=!M! times|1=time} you would lose HP.
${modID}:Buffer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Prevent the next {!M!|@=!M! times|1=time} you would lose HP.

${modID}:Burst.DESCRIPTION: {@@}This turn, your next {!M!|@=!M! Skills are|1=Skill is} played twice.
${modID}:Burst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}This turn, your next {!M!|@=!M! Skills are|1=Skill is} played twice.

${modID}:Creative AI.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, add {!M!|@=!M! random Power cards|1=a random Power card} into your hand.

${modID}:Double Tap.DESCRIPTION: {@@}This turn, your next {!M!|@=!M! Attacks are|1=Attack is} played twice.
${modID}:Double Tap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}This turn, your next {!M!|@=!M! Attacks are|1=Attack is} played twice.

${modID}:Dual Wield.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Choose an Attack or Power card. Add {!M!|@=!M! copies|1=a copy} of that card into your hand.
${modID}:Dual Wield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Choose an Attack or Power card. Add {!M!|@=!M! copies|1=a copy} of that card into your hand.

${modID}:Loop.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, trigger the passive ability of your next Orb{!M!|@= !M! times|1=}.
${modID}:Loop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, trigger the passive ability of your next Orb{!M!|@= !M! times|1=}.

${modID}:Magnetism.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, add {!M!|@=!M! random Colorless cards|1=a random Colorless card} into your hand.

${modID}:Mayhem.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, play the top {!M!|@=!M! cards|1=card} of your draw pile.

${modID}:Meditate.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Put {!M!|@=!M! cards|1=a card} from your discard pile into your hand and Retain it. NL Enter Calm. NL End your turn.
${modID}:Meditate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Put {!M!|@=!M! cards|1=a card} from your discard pile into your hand and Retain them. NL Enter Calm. NL End your turn.

${modID}:Omniscience.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Choose a card in your draw pile. NL Play the chosen card{!M!|@= !M! times|1=|2= twice} and exhaust it. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Rip and Tear.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to a random enemy{!M!|@= !M! times|1=|2= twice}.

${modID}:Storm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power card, Channel !M! Lightning.
${modID}:Storm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a Power card, Channel !M! Lightning.

${modID}:Study.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the end of your turn, shuffle {!M!|@=!M! *Insights|1=an *Insight} into your draw pile.

${modID}:Tactician.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, gain{!M!|repeat= [G]|>4= !M! [G]}.
${modID}:Tactician.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, gain{!M!|repeat= [G]|>4= !M! [G]}.

${modID}:Turbo.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain{!M!|repeat= [B]|>4= !M! [B]}. NL Add a *Void into your discard pile.
${modID}:Turbo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain{!M!|repeat= [B]|>4= !M! [B]}. NL Add a *Void into your discard pile.

${modID}:Undo.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Retain your hand {!M!|@=for !M! turns|1=this turn}.
